locations.name: Edinburgh
locations.description: Scotland's capital city, the starting point of the tour, known for its historic Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle, and blend of medieval and Georgian architecture.

locations.name: Isle of Skye (represented by Portree)
locations.description: An overnight stay on the enchanting Isle of Skye, famed for its otherworldly landscapes like the Cuillin mountains, Neist Point, and the Old Man of Storr. Portree, the main town, is a likely base.

locations.name: Inverness
locations.description: The cultural capital of the Highlands and the final destination, serving as a base to explore Loch Ness, Culloden Battlefield, and local whisky distilleries.
